Package cz.cuni.mff.desitka.logic.game

Class GameViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
cz.cuni.mff.desitka.logic.game.GameViewModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameStates
public class GameViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel implements GameStates
ViewModel for game logic. This class holds the data and methods related to the game functionality of the application.

  • Nested Class Summary
